findings.rationale: The obligation to maintain confidentiality lasts only three years, which may expose sensitive information after this period.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for three (3) years from the date of execution.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Specificity in Confidential Information
findings.rationale: The broad definition of Confidential Information may lead to ambiguity in what is protected under the agreement.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information includes all proprietary information, trade secrets, business plans, financial data, and technical information.

findings.rationale: The choice of Texas as governing law may not favor one party over the other, but could have implications for enforcement and interpretation.
